body: Half-orcs with this trait know little of their orc ancestry and were raised among humans and other half-orcs in a large city. City-raised half-orcs are proficient with whips and longswords, and receive a +2 racial bonus on Knowledge (local) checks. This racial trait replaces weapon familiarity.
name: City-Raised
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Orcs/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/City-Raised
